1.0.name: wordpress/iammobiled-mobile
1.0.description: Key features include 1) Mobile Theme "Blue Heart" included 2) Automatic mobile detection 3) Images are optimized for mobile view 4) Make money through integrated ad system. 5) Optimized for touch screen phones 6) Mobile users can even leave comments 7) Mobile users can search for contents.
